title: ‘Much More Than I Expected’: Van der Breggen Proves She’s Still Got it in Strade Bianche Slugfest
content:
Van der Breggen, Ferrand-Prévot roll back the years, shoot warning to women's peloton with blazing comeback rides at Strade Bianche.

Read the full article at ‘Much More Than I Expected’: Van der Breggen Proves She’s Still Got it in Strade Bianche Slugfest on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
